Prep Time: 15 Minutes
Cook Time: 45 Minutes
Ready In: 1 Hour
Servings: 100

Ingredients:
50 pounds unpeeled red potatoes, quartered
8 pounds butter, room temperature
3 pounds Romano cheese, grated

3 cups chopped garlic
1/2 cup salt
1/2 cup dried oregano

Directions:
1.Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm,
about 45 minutes; drain. Stir in butter, cheese, garlic, salt and oregano. Mash with a potato
masher or with an electric mixer.
